summary:
International experienced Account Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the Recycling & Food Industry and Energy sector. Both technical and commercial broad experience looking after projects throughout Europe and the World.

Customer and solution minded, works well in teams and get things done!

courses.name: COSHH - Control of Substances Hazardous to Health
Offshore Survival – Basic Offshore Safety Induction & Emergency Training Course / HUET - Nogepa

profile_positions.description:
Mavitec Group is a Dutch company providing solutions for businesses with large quantities of animal by-products, biomass and other fuel sources. Mavitec is based in The Netherlands, has sales and service offices worldwide and consists of three divisions:

- Mavitec Rendering
Mavitec Rendering offers complete systems and equipment for processing and rendering of animal by-products. We are specialized in the designing, manufacturing and installation of high quality process systems. Our batch and continuous rendering solutions create the best nutrient values in the market for meat and bone meal, whole meal, feather meal, blood meal, poultry meat meal, tallow, fat and oils. Together with the Dupps Company we have installed many installations worldwide for decades. Due to our extensive network we are able to make installations designed to clients preferences.

- Mavitec Green Energy
Mavitec Green Energy is specialized in food waste and depackaging solutions with short payback times, high separation efficiency and proven concepts. Our machines are designed to separate the organic material from the packaging and deliver clean organic product that is extremely suitable for biogas installations.

- Mavitec Environmental
A new way of solving manure issues! Mavitec Environmental provides an innovative gasification system that converts manure, litter and organic waste into green energy and high value EcoChar. Our gasification system maximizes the value of your waste stream and improves the environment.

With a lot of expertise in engineering, construction, installation, delivery and after sales, we provide complex process solutions in a simple and effective way, customized to the needs of our clients.
profile_positions.title: Manager Sales

profile_positions.title: Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Business development within the Continental European area. Looking after Belgium, France, Spain, Denmark, Hungary and Mediterranean area.

We provide our customers with the services, products and expertise they need to measure, improve, control and process flow from their high-value oil and gas wells.

We aim to achieve this by employing the industry’s best people who are committed to delivering the highest standards of safety, quality and personalised service to our customers every time.

Expro’s 40+ years of experience and innovation empowers the company to offer tailor-made solutions for customers across the energy sector. With over 4,500 employees operating across all the main
hydrocarbon-producing areas of the world, Expro offers a truly global service solution.

From exploration and appraisal through to mature field production optimisation and enhancement, with a specific focus on offshore, deepwater and other technically challenging environments, we provide a range of mission critical services across three key areas:

• Well Test & Appraisal Services
• Subsea, Completion & Intervention Services
• Production Services

These are delivered through our twelve distinct product lines:

• DST/TCP
• EGIS
• Fluids
• Meters
• Pipeline & flarestack
• PowerChokes®
• Production
• SafeWells™
• Subsea
• Well Intervention
• Well Testing
• Wireless Well Solutions
profile_positions.title: Client Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Business development within the Continental European area. 

What we do
Expro’s business is well flow management.  Our key technologies, core and more specialised services assist our customers to measure, improve, control and process flow from their wells.

Expro operates in all the major hydrocarbon producing areas of the world, employing more than 4,500 people in 50 countries. With our head office in the UK, Expro has regional headquarters in Aberdeen, Cape Town, Dubai, Houston, Kuala Lumpur and Rio. We have grown rapidly in recent years to become a market leader in the offshore and subsea arena, with a strengthened presence in gas wells and land markets.

Expro’s global product line teams are supported by our network of multi-discipline experts, ensuring consistency of service and underpinning our commitment to deliver service excellence to our customers worldwide.

Expro offers services and products through four marketing segments:

Well Testing & Commissioning 
Production Systems 
Wireline Intervention 
Deepwater Intervention 

The range of technologies and specialised services that we offer across our portfolio allows us to provide integrated solutions to our customers worldwide.

Expro’s expertise extends across the lifecycle of a well, reinforcing our ability to assist our customers to achieve their goals – from Exploration & Appraisal through to Abandonment.
profile_positions.title: Client Account Representative

profile_positions.description: During my role as Business Development Trainee I got the opportunity to both technical and commercial placements in Holland and abroad, including offshore field experience.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Started working as a Wireline Assistant offshore to familiarize Expro's equipment, procedures and systems.

Working on rigs and production platforms assisting during (0.125 and 0.160) Slickline jobs as:

-	Rigging up and down wireline equipment
-	Running / pulling plugs
-	Running MPLT
-	Replacing DHSV
-      Memory Gauges


During  my period as a Wireline Assistent I gained good knowledge and understanding of a complete Slickline operation.
profile_positions.title: Wireline Assistant

profile_positions.description:
After my period as a Welltest assistant I got the opportunity to join the CHSE department and work as a CHSE Engineer. 

In  this seven month period  I got involved in the Memory Gauge campaign for Gaz de France, Working mainly in the North Sea. I performed around 50 memory gauge operations and several Static Pressure Gradient ( SPG) runs. Working alongside wireline I took the opportunity to gain knowledge and get involved in Wireline operations . 

After the Memory Gauge campaign finished I continued working as a CHSE Data Engineer.  Working nightshifts taking care of all responsibilities of a Data engineer during a Acid  Stimulation & Clean-up job and supporting the Welltest crew ( Noble al White for Total).
profile_positions.title: CHS Data Engineer

profile_positions.description:
To gain more knowledge of the Expro Well Test business I joined the Well Test department and started in the office as a Well Test Technical Assistant. Over a period of 3 months I performed various operational duties. 

I also completed several courses like: 
-	NOGEPA 0.5A – Basis Offshore Safety Introduction and Emergency Response Training
-	Well Test Design Report
-	Well Test 1 Course
-	Hydrocarbon Containment 1


After 3 months in the office I joined the Well Test Operational Team and got involved in a number of offshore jobs as a Technician (Rig up, Frac Operation, Clean Out, Well Test, Rig Down).
The tail end of my period at the Well Test Department I spent working in the maintenance department for 3 weeks to assist the preparation for a Well Test job in Poznan, Poland.
Afterwards I also served as a Well Test Technician on this particular job, rigging up the package and operating the clean out and extended Well Test.
profile_positions.title: Well Test Technical Assistant / Technician

profile_positions.description: Supporting the BD Department and worked on different BD projects.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Technical Assistant

profile_positions.description: During this internship I developed a Quality Management System complying to ISO 9001, 14001 and OHSAS 18001.
profile_positions.title: QHSE Intern, Den Helder

profile_positions.description: During this first internship I have worked on setting up processes for the new Expro Bases in Italy and several other projects within the QHSE Department
profile_positions.title: QHSE Intern, Den Helder
